transcript: Hey, I am Sam. How are you?
body_language: leaning forward with steady eye contact

transcript: I came to you because I don't understand a lot of things in life right now. I am seeking ways to better myself.
Can you explain how you support a close friend who is struggling, even when you don't feel comfortable discussing their issues directly?
There was a time I really wanted to go on a trip but couldn't focus on anything else due to it. I don't knwo why i couldn't. I am still confused.
body_language: excited gestures with a confident smile

transcript: How do you make a decision while balancing your emotions and logical thinking?
body_language: tapping fingers with a thoughtful look

transcript: When making choices, how  do you value the opinions of others compared to your own perspective? Any thoughts?
tHere was a time in life when i was at a very low point. I didn't know what to do. And I still don't
These days, I have been thinking of joining or creating my own Cricket Team. Maybe I will.
body_language: slightly shaking hands with quick blinking

transcript: Any Idea how to manage you emotional state, when in crisis?
body_language: open hands with a calming breath

transcript: If a problem feels too personal, should you talk to someone about it, or should you keep it to yourself?
When faced with many problems at once, how do you decide whose advice to follow?
body_language: hands through hair, then pointing while explaining

transcript: What makes you feel approachable so others can share their thoughts with you?
Why do you think empathy is important for effective communication?
When you feel panic, how do you calm yourself down and regain control?
I have having inner struggles with myself.
I got selected for a Football team. I am pumped to join them.
body_language: hands clasped with a small nod

transcript: I feel like, i have over the last few years a lot. I feel amazing.
These days, so much work i have. i don't know how to complete the work.
I am feeling do much rage. I can't express it and it keeps rising.
